overview: Musical - Gauri lives with her crippled ex-army dad and brother. One day she notices a man calling himself Ranjeet lurking around their house. What she doesn't know is that Ranjeet is here for a reason--the suitcase of gold he had buried in Gauri's front yard.  Sunil Dutt, Madhubala, Nasir Hussain
title: Insaan Jaag Utha
